original: de nyid ni 'da' bar bya ba ma yin pa nyid kyi phyir dam tshig go //
analyzed: de nyid ni 'da' bar bya ba ma yin pa nyid kyi phyir dam tshig go //
translated: That is the commitment because it is not to be transgressed.

original: bcu gcig po de las gang yang rung ba'i sbyor ba dang ldan pas 'khor lo lte bar gnas nas bka'i dkyil 'khor sbyar bar bya ste /
analyzed: bcu gcig po de las gang yang rung ba'i sbyor ba dang ldan pas 'khor lo lte bar gnas nas bka'i dkyil 'khor sbyar bar bya ste /
translated: Having applied any one of those eleven, one should apply the wheel of the word, abiding in the center of the wheel.

original: bka' ltar byed pa'i 'khor lo ni bka'i 'khor lo'o //
analyzed: bka' ltar byed pa'i 'khor lo ni bka'i 'khor lo'o //
translated: The wheel of the word is the wheel of the one who acts according to the word.

original: rtsibs bcur gnas pa'i khro bo bcu po de rab tu sbyar bar bya ba de'i dgos pa ni phyogs bcur 'od zer gyi sprin rab tu 'gyed par byed pa'o //
analyzed: rtsibs bcur gnas pa'i khro bo bcu po de rab tu sbyar bar bya ba de'i dgos pa ni phyogs bcur 'od zer gyi sprin rab tu 'gyed par byed pa'o //
translated: The purpose of applying those ten wrathful ones abiding in the ten directions is to emit clouds of light rays in the ten directions.

original: sngags kun zhes bya ba ni lha thams cad kyi sbyor ba'o //
analyzed: sngags kun zhes bya ba ni lha thams cad kyi sbyor ba'o //
translated: All mantras means the application of all deities.

original: ye shes mchog ni nang gi bdag nyid can gyi dkyil 'khor ro //
analyzed: ye shes mchog ni nang gi bdag nyid can gyi dkyil 'khor ro //
translated: The supreme intuition is the inner nature mandala.

original: rdo rje ni phyi'i dkyil 'khor pa ste rten dang bcas pa de dag ldan pas na'o //🔽srung ba'i don ni srung ba'i thabs te srung ba'i 'khor los bgegs rnams bsal la cho ga bzhin du rdo rje 'chang ba rnam par bsgoms te /
analyzed: rdo rje ni phyi'i dkyil 'khor pa ste rten dang bcas pa de dag ldan pas na'o // srung ba'i don ni srung ba'i thabs te srung ba'i 'khor los bgegs rnams bsal la cho ga bzhin du rdo rje 'chang ba rnam par bsgoms te /
translated: The vajra is the outer mandala, and since it is endowed with the support, it is endowed with the vajra and the supreme intuition.

original: 'dod chags chen po'i tshul la sogs pa'i rim gyis dang por sbyor ba bsgom par bya'o //
analyzed: 'dod chags chen po'i tshul la sogs pa'i rim gyis dang por sbyor ba bsgom par bya'o //
translated: The meaning of protection is the method of protection. Having cleared away the obstructors with the protection wheel, one should visualize the vajra holder according to the rite, and meditate on the first union by the stages of the method of great passion, and so on.

original: de nyid kyi cho ga bstan par bya ba'i phyir nam mkha'i zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: de nyid kyi cho ga bstan par bya ba'i phyir nam mkha'i zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: In order to teach just that rite, [the Bhagavān] declares space, and so on.

original: chos 'byung ba'i phyag rgya chen po ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa nyid kyi phyir nam mkha' ste ;
analyzed: chos 'byung ba'i phyag rgya chen po ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa nyid kyi phyir nam mkha' ste ;
translated: The great seal of the origin of reality is space, because it is equal to space.

original: nam mkha' la gnas pa'i sna tshogs rdo rje ni nam mkha' rdo rje'o //
analyzed: nam mkha' la gnas pa'i sna tshogs rdo rje ni nam mkha' rdo rje'o //
translated: The vajra cross situated in space is the space vajra.

original: de'i dbus gnas pa ni dbus na 'dug pa'o //
analyzed: de'i dbus gnas pa ni dbus na 'dug pa'o //
translated: Situated in its center means situated in the middle.

original: chos zhes bya ba ni yi ge bhr'um mo //
analyzed: chos zhes bya ba ni yi ge bhr'um mo //
translated: The syllable bhrūṃ is called reality.

original: ji lta bu zhe na /
analyzed: ji lta bu zhe na /
translated: What is it like?

original: rnam par snang mdzad sku mchog las byung ba ste sna tshogs 'di la snang bar mdzad pa'i phyir rnam par snang @315a * //
analyzed: rnam par snang mdzad sku mchog las byung ba ste sna tshogs 'di la snang bar mdzad pa'i phyir rnam par snang @315a * //
translated: It is the origin of the supreme body of Vairocana, because it illuminates this variety.

original: mdzad ye shes kyi mtshan ma'o //
analyzed: mdzad ye shes kyi mtshan ma'o //
translated: Vairocana is the sign of gnosis.

original: de rnams kyi sku'i mchog ni tshogs chen po ste /
analyzed: de rnams kyi sku'i mchog ni tshogs chen po ste /
translated: The supreme body of those is the great collection,

original: ye shes rgya mtsho zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: ye shes rgya mtsho zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: meaning the ocean of gnosis.

original: de 'byung ba'i de las skyes pa yin pas ni de skyes zhes bya'o //
analyzed: de 'byung ba'i de las skyes pa yin pas ni de skyes zhes bya'o //
translated: Since it arises from that, it is born from that.

original: sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi ro tshogs pa dang ro gcig pa'i phung po ni sku gsum ste de nyid ni ye shes kyi rgya mtsho'o //
analyzed: sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi ro tshogs pa dang ro gcig pa'i phung po ni sku gsum ste de nyid ni ye shes kyi rgya mtsho'o //
translated: The body of the collection of the taste of body, speech, and mind, which is of one taste, is the three bodies, which is itself the ocean of gnosis.

original: de nyid ni gzhi'i rgya mtsho tshul du yongs su gyur pa de'i dam tshig bsdus pa 'di la yod pas ni sku gsum dam tshig go //
analyzed: de nyid ni gzhi'i rgya mtsho tshul du yongs su gyur pa de'i dam tshig bsdus pa 'di la yod pas ni sku gsum dam tshig go //
translated: That very syllable bhrūṃ is the pledge of the three bodies, because it exists in the concise pledge of that transformation into the manner of the ocean of the ground.

original: de lta bu'i yi ge bhr'um bsams nas gdan du de rab tu brtags te /
analyzed: de lta bu'i yi ge bhr'um bsams nas gdan du de rab tu brtags te /
translated: Having contemplated that syllable bhrūṃ, one should thoroughly investigate it as the seat.

original: yi ge bhr'um de nyid gzhal yas khang rim pa gnyis pa rang gi gdan gyi mgon dang bcas par bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: yi ge bhr'um de nyid gzhal yas khang rim pa gnyis pa rang gi gdan gyi mgon dang bcas par bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that one should transform that syllable bhrūṃ into the immeasurable mansion with two levels together with one's own seat.

original: de'i dbus su chud pa'i mkha' dbyings rnam par bsgom pa ni don gyis na dbus ma'i gdan la gnas pa'o //
analyzed: de'i dbus su chud pa'i mkha' dbyings rnam par bsgom pa ni don gyis na dbus ma'i gdan la gnas pa'o //
translated: The contemplation of the space element contained within that is, by implication, located on the central seat.

original: nam mkha' ni nam mkha' yin la /
analyzed: nam mkha' ni nam mkha' yin la /
translated: Space is space,

original: dbyings ni 'jig rten gyi yin pas na nam mkha'i dbyings te zla ba'i dkyil 'khor ro //
analyzed: dbyings ni 'jig rten gyi yin pas na nam mkha'i dbyings te zla ba'i dkyil 'khor ro //
translated: and since the element is of the world, the space element is the moon maṇḍala.

original: yongs su gang ba ni cha med pa'o //
analyzed: yongs su gang ba ni cha med pa'o //
translated: Being filled means being partless.

original: sangs rgyas thams cad kyis zhes bya ba ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yon tan gyi sa bon gyi rang bzhin can dbyangs kyi yi ge shin tu dkar ba bcu drug la ste /
analyzed: sangs rgyas thams cad kyis zhes bya ba ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yon tan gyi sa bon gyi rang bzhin can dbyangs kyi yi ge shin tu dkar ba bcu drug la ste /
translated: All the Buddhas means that the nature of the seed of the qualities of all the Buddhas is the sixteen extremely white vowels.

original: 'di ni me long lta bu'i ye shes so ;
analyzed: 'di ni me long lta bu'i ye shes so ;
translated: This is mirror-like primordial wisdom.

original: / de'i dbus na gnas pa'i rang sngags yi ge'i gnas bsgom par bya zhes bya ba sbyor ro //
analyzed: / de'i dbus na gnas pa'i rang sngags yi ge'i gnas bsgom par bya zhes bya ba sbyor ro //
translated: One should meditate on the location of the syllable of one's own mantra in the middle of that.

original: rang sngags ni mchog dang po'i snying po'o //
analyzed: rang sngags ni mchog dang po'i snying po'o //
translated: One's own mantra is the essence of the primordial supreme.

original: de yang gsal byed kyi yi ge sum cu rtsa bzhi shin tu dkar ba shin tu rnam par dag pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yon tan gyi rang bzhin can no //
analyzed: de yang gsal byed kyi yi ge sum cu rtsa bzhi shin tu dkar ba shin tu rnam par dag pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yon tan gyi rang bzhin can no //
translated: Moreover, the thirty-four consonants are extremely white, extremely pure, and have the nature of the qualities of all the Buddhas.

original: de las byung ba ni gnas te /
analyzed: de las byung ba ni gnas te /
translated: The location is that which arises from that.

original: mtshan ma dang po'i rdo rje'o //
analyzed: mtshan ma dang po'i rdo rje'o //
translated: The sign is the first vajra.

original: 'di ni mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes so //🔽de'i dbus su chud pa'i ye shes thugs kyi rnam par te /
analyzed: 'di ni mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes so // de'i dbus su chud pa'i ye shes thugs kyi rnam par te /
translated: This is the primordial wisdom of equality.🔽In the middle of that, one should meditate on the primordial wisdom of the mind,

original: dang po'i snying po'i rnam par bsgom par bya ste /
analyzed: dang po'i snying po'i rnam par bsgom par bya ste /
translated: which is included in the form of the essence of the first.

original: 'di ni so sor rtog pa'i ye shes so //
analyzed: 'di ni so sor rtog pa'i ye shes so //
translated: This is the wisdom of discernment.

original: yang zhes bya ba ni phyis so //
analyzed: yang zhes bya ba ni phyis so //
translated: “Again” means later.

original: thugs kyi rdo rje des bsgoms nas te kun nas bskyed nas sangs rgyas thams cad de nyid du rab tu bsdu bar bya ste /
analyzed: thugs kyi rdo rje des bsgoms nas te kun nas bskyed nas sangs rgyas thams cad de nyid du rab tu bsdu bar bya ste /
translated: Having meditated on that vajra of mind, having generated it, he should gather all the buddhas into it.

original: 'di ni bya ba nan tan gyi ye shes so //
analyzed: 'di ni bya ba nan tan gyi ye shes so //
translated: This is the wisdom of successful activity.

original: thugs kyi zhes bya ba ni yi ge h'um de nyid do //
analyzed: thugs kyi zhes bya ba ni yi ge h'um de nyid do //
translated: “Of mind” means that very syllable hūṃ.

original: rdo rjer byas pa'i phyir zhes bya ba ni rig ma dang bcas pa'i mchog dang @315b po'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rdo rjer byas pa'i phyir zhes bya ba ni rig ma dang bcas pa'i mchog dang @315b po'i phyir ro //
translated: “Having made it into a vajra” means having made it into the supreme along with the knowledge woman.

original: 'di ni chos kyi dbyings shin tu rnam par dag pa'i ye shes so //
analyzed: 'di ni chos kyi dbyings shin tu rnam par dag pa'i ye shes so //
translated: This is the wisdom of the extremely pure sphere of phenomena.

original: sku gsum zhes bya ba ni gsum char gyi gnas te rdo rje 'chang ba'i thugs kar zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: sku gsum zhes bya ba ni gsum char gyi gnas te rdo rje 'chang ba'i thugs kar zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: “Of the three bodies” means of the three, the place, the heart of Vajradhara.

original: de dag ces bya ba ni zla ba dang rdo rje dang sngags te gsum mo //
analyzed: de dag ces bya ba ni zla ba dang rdo rje dang sngags te gsum mo //
translated: “Those” means the three, the moon, the vajra, and the mantra.

original: mdzad ces bya ba ni dgod pa'o //
analyzed: mdzad ces bya ba ni dgod pa'o //
translated: “He should make” means he should place.

original: nam mkha' zhes bya ba ni chos 'byung bar ro //
analyzed: nam mkha' zhes bya ba ni chos 'byung bar ro //
translated: “In space” means in the sphere of phenomena.

original: rdo rje'i dam tshig ni rdo rje 'dzin pa rnam pa lngas mtshon par byang chub bo //
analyzed: rdo rje'i dam tshig ni rdo rje 'dzin pa rnam pa lngas mtshon par byang chub bo //
translated: The adamantine commitment is illustrated by the five adamantine holders.

original: de ston par mdzad pa la yang de skad ces bya'o //
analyzed: de ston par mdzad pa la yang de skad ces bya'o //
translated: The one who teaches that is also called that.

original: 'di ni ye shes lnga'i go rims so //
analyzed: 'di ni ye shes lnga'i go rims so //
translated: This is the order of the five intuitions.

original: rdo rje nyid ni rdo rje 'chang ba'o //
analyzed: rdo rje nyid ni rdo rje 'chang ba'o //
translated: The adamantine itself is the holder of the vajra.

original: de'i sngags rin po che ni rab sngags kyi mchog go //
analyzed: de'i sngags rin po che ni rab sngags kyi mchog go //
translated: The jewel of his mantra is the supreme mantra.

original: de'i rab tu snang bar byed pa ni gsal bar byed pa ste /
analyzed: de'i rab tu snang bar byed pa ni gsal bar byed pa ste /
translated: The one who illuminates that is the illuminator.

original: sangs rgyas thams cad spro ba dang / rdo rje 'chang ba bskyed pa dang / de'i thugs kar mar me ltar 'bar ba'o //
analyzed: sangs rgyas thams cad spro ba dang / rdo rje 'chang ba bskyed pa dang / de'i thugs kar mar me ltar 'bar ba'o //
translated: It is the emanation of all buddhas, the generation of the vajra holder, and the blazing like a lamp in his heart.

original: de byed pa yin pas na de byed pa'o //
analyzed: de byed pa yin pas na de byed pa'o //
translated: Because it does that, it is the doer of that.

original: chu la 'chag pa'i cho ga ni rnam pa'i mchog rnams zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
analyzed: chu la 'chag pa'i cho ga ni rnam pa'i mchog rnams zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
translated: The rite of walking on water is stated by “the best of forms” and so on.

original: sangs rgyas rim par bkod nas ni //
analyzed: sangs rgyas rim par bkod nas ni //
translated: Having arranged the buddhas in order,

original: zhes bya ba ni snying ga'i sa bon las sangs rgyas phra mo'i spro ba'i sbyor bas rang gi lus kyi rdul phra rab sangs rgyas kyi rang bzhin du bya ba dang / chu'i phra rab thams cad kyang sangs rgyas kyi rang bzhin du byas te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni snying ga'i sa bon las sangs rgyas phra mo'i spro ba'i sbyor bas rang gi lus kyi rdul phra rab sangs rgyas kyi rang bzhin du bya ba dang / chu'i phra rab thams cad kyang sangs rgyas kyi rang bzhin du byas te /
translated: This means that by the yoga of emanating subtle buddhas from the seed syllable at the heart, you should make your body's atoms the nature of buddhas, and you should make all the atoms of water the nature of buddhas.

original: ri rab ltar sra zhing mkhregs par bsgom pa'i sbyor bas brtan par bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: ri rab ltar sra zhing mkhregs par bsgom pa'i sbyor bas brtan par bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that you should stabilize them by the yoga of meditating on them as solid and firm like Mount Meru.

original: sangs rgyas kyi rang bzhin du byas pa nyid kyi phyir chu la rkang pa mnyam par gzhag pa yin pas na /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi rang bzhin du byas pa nyid kyi phyir chu la rkang pa mnyam par gzhag pa yin pas na /
translated: Since you have made them the nature of buddhas, you should place your feet evenly on the water.

original: rkang pa mnyam gzhag sbyor bas so //
analyzed: rkang pa mnyam gzhag sbyor bas so //
translated: Therefore, it says, “by the yoga of placing the feet evenly.”

original: gzhung la la las ni /
analyzed: gzhung la la las ni /
translated: In some texts, it says,

original: rkang pa mnyam nyid sbyor ba yis //🔽zhes 'byung ste /
analyzed: rkang pa mnyam nyid sbyor ba yis // zhes 'byung ste /
translated: “by the yoga of the equality of the feet.”

original: deng ni spyi bo dang rkang pa ni sangs rgyas kyi rang bzhin du mnyam pas na rkang pa de'i ste /
analyzed: deng ni spyi bo dang rkang pa ni sangs rgyas kyi rang bzhin du mnyam pas na rkang pa de'i ste /
translated: The meaning is that since the crown of your head and your feet are equal in being the nature of buddhas, it is the feet.

original: de la dmigs pa'i sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: de la dmigs pa'i sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that you should apply yourself to that.

original: de nyid kyi phyir sangs rgyas rnams la sangs rgyas kyi dgod pa rang bzhin dag par bstan pas na ngo bo nyid dag pa'o //
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir sangs rgyas rnams la sangs rgyas kyi dgod pa rang bzhin dag par bstan pas na ngo bo nyid dag pa'o //
translated: Therefore, since the Buddhas teach the natural purity of the Buddha's smile, it is intrinsically pure.

original: rdo rje'i bdag nyid can gyi rgya mtsho dang rkang pas gnon pa 'di la yod pas na de skad ces bya'o //
analyzed: rdo rje'i bdag nyid can gyi rgya mtsho dang rkang pas gnon pa 'di la yod pas na de skad ces bya'o //
translated: It is so called because it has the nature of a vajra, and it tramples with its feet on the ocean.

original: tshig gnon pa ni dbang chen zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: tshig gnon pa ni dbang chen zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: The trampling of words is stated with the great power, etc.

original: rtsod pa smra ba'i dus su rang gi lha nyid kyi sbyor ba ser por byas nas so //🔽dbus su zhes bya ba rgol ba'i kha'i dbus su dbang chen gyi dkyil 'khor lam @316a * //
analyzed: rtsod pa smra ba'i dus su rang gi lha nyid kyi sbyor ba ser por byas nas so // dbus su zhes bya ba rgol ba'i kha'i dbus su dbang chen gyi dkyil 'khor lam @316a * //
translated: At the time of speaking in debate, one should make one's deity yellow.

original: las byung ba zur bzhi pa ser po grva bzhir rdo rje rtse gsum pas mtshan pa can grva'i rdo rje de dag nyid kyis bsgrub par bya ba'i rna ba dang lce rtsa dang rkan dang spyi bo phug ste byung nas legs par gnas par bsgoms nas ni'o //
analyzed: las byung ba zur bzhi pa ser po grva bzhir rdo rje rtse gsum pas mtshan pa can grva'i rdo rje de dag nyid kyis bsgrub par bya ba'i rna ba dang lce rtsa dang rkan dang spyi bo phug ste byung nas legs par gnas par bsgoms nas ni'o //
translated: In the middle means in the middle of the mouth of the opponent, one should visualize a square yellow maṇḍala of great power, arisen from the path, marked with three-pronged vajras in the four corners, and those vajras in the corners pierce the ear, tongue, palate, and crown of the head of the one to be subdued, and having arisen, they are well-established.

original: khro bo'i rigs bzhag la zhes bya ba ni ri bo ser po lta bu'i khro bo nam mkha' bsams nas khro bo gcig gi rnam par sbyar bar bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: khro bo'i rigs bzhag la zhes bya ba ni ri bo ser po lta bu'i khro bo nam mkha' bsams nas khro bo gcig gi rnam par sbyar bar bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The one of the wrathful type is the wrathful one who is like a yellow mountain, and one should visualize him in the form of one wrathful one.

original: ji ltar sbyar bar bya zhe na /
analyzed: ji ltar sbyar bar bya zhe na /
translated: How should one visualize him?

original: de'i spyi bor bsgom zhes bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: de'i spyi bor bsgom zhes bya ba gsungs te /
translated: He says, one should visualize him on his head,

original: bsgrub par bya ba kha sbub tu 'gyel ba spobs pa med pa de'i mgo bor lhag par bsgom par bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: bsgrub par bya ba kha sbub tu 'gyel ba spobs pa med pa de'i mgo bor lhag par bsgom par bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: meaning that one should visualize him on the head of the one to be subdued, who is lying face down, and is without self-confidence.

original: ci 'dra ba zhig ce na /🔽las kyi rdo rje'i rkang pas gnon par te /
analyzed: ci 'dra ba zhig ce na / las kyi rdo rje'i rkang pas gnon par te /
translated: What kind of one?🔽He says, pressing down with the foot of the karma vajra,

original: bsgrub par bya ba'i mgo bo'i ltag par dbyangs kyi yi ge tha ma las byung ba'i sna tshogs rdo rje gang yin pa de de'i rkang pa g-yon pa brkyang pa gnon pa de ltar na de skad ces bya'o //
analyzed: bsgrub par bya ba'i mgo bo'i ltag par dbyangs kyi yi ge tha ma las byung ba'i sna tshogs rdo rje gang yin pa de de'i rkang pa g-yon pa brkyang pa gnon pa de ltar na de skad ces bya'o //
translated: meaning that the one to be subdued is lying face down, and the karma vajra presses down on the back of his head with his left foot extended.

original: dpung gnon pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa la rdo rje gsum mchog ces bya ba ni dkyil 'khor pa'i tshogs spros te /🔽rang gi dkyil 'khor pa'i tshogs rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa spros pa'o //
analyzed: dpung gnon pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa la rdo rje gsum mchog ces bya ba ni dkyil 'khor pa'i tshogs spros te / rang gi dkyil 'khor pa'i tshogs rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa spros pa'o //
translated: The supreme attributes are blue.🔽 The supreme action is variegated.🔽 The supreme body is yellow.

original: sku mchog ni ser po yin te /
analyzed: sku mchog ni ser po yin te /
translated: The supreme speech is red.🔽 The supreme mind is white.

original: ge sar mdog 'dra ba ni 'bar ba rnams kyis so //
analyzed: ge sar mdog 'dra ba ni 'bar ba rnams kyis so //
translated: The supreme attributes are blue.

original: spyi bor zhes bya ba ni dpung gi tshogs rnams so so'i spyi bor ro //
analyzed: spyi bor zhes bya ba ni dpung gi tshogs rnams so so'i spyi bor ro //
translated: The supreme action is variegated.🔽 The supreme body is yellow.🔽 The supreme speech is red.🔽 The supreme mind is white.🔽 The supreme attributes are blue.🔽 The supreme action is variegated.🔽 The supreme body is yellow.

original: khyad par du ni dpa' bo rnams la dbang chen gyi dkyil 'khor la gnas pa'i las kyi rdo rje steng rkang pas gnon pa zhes bya ba 'dir yang sbyar bar bya'o //
analyzed: khyad par du ni dpa' bo rnams la dbang chen gyi dkyil 'khor la gnas pa'i las kyi rdo rje steng rkang pas gnon pa zhes bya ba 'dir yang sbyar bar bya'o //
translated: The supreme speech is red.

original: 'dir man ngag ni /
analyzed: 'dir man ngag ni /
translated: The supreme mind is white.🔽 The supreme attributes are blue.🔽 The supreme action is variegated.

translated: Oṃ jinajik, do such-and-such a pacifying!

original: rang gi ming gi yi ge dang po las bskyed par bya'o //
analyzed: rang gi ming gi yi ge dang po las bskyed par bya'o //
translated: One should generate the mantra syllables from the first letter of one's own name.

original: spyan la sogs pa'i mchog rnams kyis //
analyzed: spyan la sogs pa'i mchog rnams kyis //
translated: With the supreme hosts of Locanā and so forth,

original: zhes bya ba ni de ltar bskyed pa'i bsgrub par bya ba'i snying ga'i zla ba la gzhag pa'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni de ltar bskyed pa'i bsgrub par bya ba'i snying ga'i zla ba la gzhag pa'o //
translated: one should place the object of the rite on the moon at the heart of the one generated in that way.

original: aom ru ru spu ru zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i sngags kyi yi ge'i phreng ba las spros pa'i spyan gyi tshogs rnams kyis so //
analyzed: aom ru ru spu ru zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i sngags kyi yi ge'i phreng ba las spros pa'i spyan gyi tshogs rnams kyis so //
translated: With the hosts of Locanā emanated from the mantra garland of Oṃ ruru sphu and so forth,

original: bsdus nas zhes bya ba ni de dag nyid do //
analyzed: bsdus nas zhes bya ba ni de dag nyid do //
translated: one should gather them together,

original: 'od kyi gong bu yis zhes bya ba ni dkar zhing bsil ba'i 'od kyis gong bu'i gzugs kyis so //
analyzed: 'od kyi gong bu yis zhes bya ba ni dkar zhing bsil ba'i 'od kyis gong bu'i gzugs kyis so //
translated: with a mass of light, that is, with a form of a mass of white, cooling light,

original: nad pa la ni dbab par bya //🔽zhes bya ba ni bsgrub par bya ba'i lus la dbang @318a * //
analyzed: nad pa la ni dbab par bya // zhes bya ba ni bsgrub par bya ba'i lus la dbang @318a * //
translated: one should cause them to descend upon the patient,

original: bskur ba'i tshul du gzhug par bya'o //
analyzed: bskur ba'i tshul du gzhug par bya'o //
translated: that is, one should cause them to enter the body of the object of the rite in the manner of conferring empowerment.

original: sangs rgyas sprin rnams zhes bya ba ni rnam par snang mdzad kyi tshogs so //
analyzed: sangs rgyas sprin rnams zhes bya ba ni rnam par snang mdzad kyi tshogs so //
translated: The “cloud of Buddhas” is the assembly of Vairocana.

original: spro zhes bya ba ni bsgrub par bya ba'i lus de nyid las so //
analyzed: spro zhes bya ba ni bsgrub par bya ba'i lus de nyid las so //
translated: “ Emanating” means from the very body of the one to be healed.

original: dbang bskur zhes bya ba ni de bzhin nyid du 'od zer gyi gong bur gyur pa zhugs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: dbang bskur zhes bya ba ni de bzhin nyid du 'od zer gyi gong bur gyur pa zhugs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: “ Consecrating” means that the light-ray sphere enters into the one to be healed.

original: nad pa ni bsgrub par bya ba de nyid do //
analyzed: nad pa ni bsgrub par bya ba de nyid do //
translated: The “patient” is the one to be healed.

original: lus dbyer mi phyed pa rdo rje lta bu dang dpal ldan par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: lus dbyer mi phyed pa rdo rje lta bu dang dpal ldan par 'gyur ro //
translated: His body becomes indivisible like a vajra and glorious.

original: skad cig gis zhes bya ba ni ring por mi thogs pa'o //
analyzed: skad cig gis zhes bya ba ni ring por mi thogs pa'o //
translated: “ In an instant” means without delay.

original: sangs rgyas ni rnam par snad mdzad yin la de'i dam tshig gi sprin ni thabs dang shes rab kyi sku spros pa'i sprin no //
analyzed: sangs rgyas ni rnam par snad mdzad yin la de'i dam tshig gi sprin ni thabs dang shes rab kyi sku spros pa'i sprin no //
translated: “ Buddha” is Vairocana, and his “cloud of commitments” is the cloud of emanations of the body of method and wisdom.

original: de rnams kyi bkod pa ni nad pa la bsdu ba'o //
analyzed: de rnams kyi bkod pa ni nad pa la bsdu ba'o //
translated: The “array” of those is the gathering for the patient.

original: de la dmigs pa nyid kyi phyir de skad ces bya'o //
analyzed: de la dmigs pa nyid kyi phyir de skad ces bya'o //
translated: It is so called because it is the very object of observation.

original: zla ba'i dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: zla ba'i dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: The “moon disk” and so forth.

original: 'dir rin chen 'byung ldan nam /
analyzed: 'dir rin chen 'byung ldan nam /
translated: Here, Ratnasaṃbhava,

original: 'od dpag tu med pa chos 'dzin pa dang / rin po che dang / chos kyi sgras gsungs te /
analyzed: 'od dpag tu med pa chos 'dzin pa dang / rin po che dang / chos kyi sgras gsungs te /
translated: Amitābha is the holder of the Dharma, Ratnasaṃbhava is the holder of the jewel, and Amoghasiddhi is the holder of the Dharma-sound.

original: kun tu 'gro ba'i chos kyi dbyings 'dzin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: kun tu 'gro ba'i chos kyi dbyings 'dzin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because they hold the all-pervading Dharma-realm.

original: de yang thams cad ser zhing sku rgyas pa yid dgyes pa dang ldan pa'o //
analyzed: de yang thams cad ser zhing sku rgyas pa yid dgyes pa dang ldan pa'o //
translated: And they are all yellow, with full bodies, and pleasing to the mind.

original: dkar mo zhes bya ba la tshogs zhes bya ba ni lhag ma ste /
analyzed: dkar mo zhes bya ba la tshogs zhes bya ba ni lhag ma ste /
translated: Pāṇḍarā means the assembly of the white ones.

original: ye shes sems dpa'i thugs ka'i nyi ma ser po la gnas pa'i bsgrub par bya ba'i snying gar zla ba ser po la /
analyzed: ye shes sems dpa'i thugs ka'i nyi ma ser po la gnas pa'i bsgrub par bya ba'i snying gar zla ba ser po la /
translated: On a yellow moon at the heart of the established being, who is on a yellow sun at the heart of the gnosis being,

original: aom ka te zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i sngags kyi yi ge'i phreng ba bkod pa las spros pa'i gos dkar mo ser po rgyas pa'i tshogs kyis zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: aom ka te zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i sngags kyi yi ge'i phreng ba bkod pa las spros pa'i gos dkar mo ser po rgyas pa'i tshogs kyis zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: one should arrange the string of syllables of the mantra, Oṃ ka te, and so on. The meaning is that the emanated yellow Pāṇḍaravāsinī fills the assembly.

original: yid bzhin nor bu rin chen sbyin //🔽zhes bya ba ni gos dkar mo zhes bya ba de nyid do //
analyzed: yid bzhin nor bu rin chen sbyin // zhes bya ba ni gos dkar mo zhes bya ba de nyid do //
translated: The wish-granting jewel is the giver of jewels.

original: de zhes bya ba ni 'od kyi gong bu'o //
analyzed: de zhes bya ba ni 'od kyi gong bu'o //
translated: That means the mass of light.

original: rin chen sprin ni chos 'dzin pa'i sprin rnams so //
analyzed: rin chen sprin ni chos 'dzin pa'i sprin rnams so //
translated: The jewel cloud is the clouds of the Dharma-holders.

original: chos kyi sprin ni zhes bya ba ni chos 'dzin pa'i sprin te /
analyzed: chos kyi sprin ni zhes bya ba ni chos 'dzin pa'i sprin te /
translated: The Dharma cloud is the cloud of the Dharma-holders.

original: 'od zer ser po bsgom pa khas blangs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'od zer ser po bsgom pa khas blangs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because of the acceptance of the meditation on the yellow light-rays.

original: dbang bskur ba ni zhes bya ba ni 'od zer gyi gong bu de nyid kyis snga ma yin no //
analyzed: dbang bskur ba ni zhes bya ba ni 'od zer gyi gong bu de nyid kyis snga ma yin no //
translated: The consecration is the same as the mass of light-rays.

original: sbyin pa nyid rdo rje yin te mi zad pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: sbyin pa nyid rdo rje yin te mi zad pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: Giving itself is a vajra, because it is inexhaustible.

original: des don bsgrub pa ni sems can rnams la phan pa byed pa'o //
analyzed: des don bsgrub pa ni sems can rnams la phan pa byed pa'o //
translated: The accomplishment of the aim is the benefit of sentient beings.

original: chos ni chos 'dzin pa'o //
analyzed: chos ni chos 'dzin pa'o //
translated: The Dharma is the Dharma-holder.

original: de'i sprin gyi dam tshig ni thabs dang shes rab kyi sku'i sprin spros pa rnams so //
analyzed: de'i sprin gyi dam tshig ni thabs dang shes rab kyi sku'i sprin spros pa rnams so //
translated: The cloud of that is the pledge of the cloud of the bodies of means and insight which are emanated.

original: de dag gi bkod pa zhes bya ba ni snga ma bzhin no //🔽rdo rje rgyal mtshan gyis mtshon pa nyid kyi phyir rdo rje yang de yin la /
analyzed: de dag gi bkod pa zhes bya ba ni snga ma bzhin no // rdo rje rgyal mtshan gyis mtshon pa nyid kyi phyir rdo rje yang de yin la /
translated: The array of those is as before.🔽Because it is characterized by the vajra banner, it is a vajra.

original: gzhu'i dbyibs can nyid yin pa'i phyir zla ba phyed pa yang yin pas na rdo rje @318b zla gam mo //
analyzed: gzhu'i dbyibs can nyid yin pa'i phyir zla ba phyed pa yang yin pas na rdo rje @318b zla gam mo //
translated: And because it has the shape of a half-moon, it is a half-moon. Thus it is a vajra half-moon.

original: de bzhin du de'i dkyil 'khor yang yin pas na rdo rje gam dkyil 'khor te /
analyzed: de bzhin du de'i dkyil 'khor yang yin pas na rdo rje gam dkyil 'khor te /
translated: Likewise, since it is also his mandala, it is the vajra-space mandala.

original: rlung gi dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: rlung gi dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning of “space mandala” is the wind mandala.

original: rdo rje nam mkha' chos mchog ces bya ba ni don yod par grub pa'o //
analyzed: rdo rje nam mkha' chos mchog ces bya ba ni don yod par grub pa'o //
translated: The one called “vajra-space supreme quality” is Amoghasiddhi.

original: de ltar nam mkha' khyab pa'i ye shes can nyid yin pa'i phyir rdo rje nam mkha' yang de yin la ye shes mchog nyid yin pa'i phyir chos kyi mchog nyid yin pas na de skad ces bya'o //
analyzed: de ltar nam mkha' khyab pa'i ye shes can nyid yin pa'i phyir rdo rje nam mkha' yang de yin la ye shes mchog nyid yin pa'i phyir chos kyi mchog nyid yin pas na de skad ces bya'o //
translated: Thus, since he has the wisdom that pervades space, he is the vajra-space. And since he is the supreme quality because he is the supreme wisdom, he is called that.

original: de yang thams cad dmar zhing chags pa'i thugs can no //
analyzed: de yang thams cad dmar zhing chags pa'i thugs can no //
translated: Moreover, he is all red and has an affectionate mind.

original: 'dod pa zhes bya ba ni 'gro ba dbang du byed par 'dod pa ste bsgrub par bya'o //
analyzed: 'dod pa zhes bya ba ni 'gro ba dbang du byed par 'dod pa ste bsgrub par bya'o //
translated: “ Desire” is the desire to bring migrating beings under control, which is to be accomplished.

original: sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' yis //
analyzed: sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' yis //
translated: The buddhas and bodhisattvas

original: zhes bya ba ni sngon du byang chub sems dpa'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni sngon du byang chub sems dpa'o //
translated: are the bodhisattvas who came before.

original: bsgrub par bya ba snying gar zla ba dmar po la bzhag ste /
analyzed: bsgrub par bya ba snying gar zla ba dmar po la bzhag ste /
translated: The one to be accomplished is placed on a red moon at the heart.

original: sgrol mi'i rig pa'i yi ge'i phreng ba bzhag pa las spros pas kun du chags shing dmar ba'i spyan la sogs pa'i lha mo bzhi po'am sgrol ma'i sprin gyis zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: sgrol mi'i rig pa'i yi ge'i phreng ba bzhag pa las spros pas kun du chags shing dmar ba'i spyan la sogs pa'i lha mo bzhi po'am sgrol ma'i sprin gyis zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that the four goddesses, Tara and so on, are emanated from the arrangement of the syllables of Tara's knowledge being, and they are all passionate and red.

original: 'od zer lnga yi sbyor ba yis //
analyzed: 'od zer lnga yi sbyor ba yis //
translated: By the union of the five lights,

original: zhes bya ba ni lha mo de rnams 'od zer lnga po nyid du gyur pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni lha mo de rnams 'od zer lnga po nyid du gyur pa'i phyir ro //
translated: the meaning is that those goddesses are transformed into the five lights.

original: gzi brjid ces bya ba ni 'od zer de nyid do //
analyzed: gzi brjid ces bya ba ni 'od zer de nyid do //
translated: Radiance is those lights.

original: der ni zhes bya ba ni bsgrub par bya ba'i lus la'o //
analyzed: der ni zhes bya ba ni bsgrub par bya ba'i lus la'o //
translated: There is in the body of the victim.

original: phyis ni sangs rgyas rnams kyis bsgrub par bya ba'i lus de nyid las spros pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i sprin nam don yod pa'i sprin gyis zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: phyis ni sangs rgyas rnams kyis bsgrub par bya ba'i lus de nyid las spros pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i sprin nam don yod pa'i sprin gyis zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: Later is the meaning of the cloud of the five Tathagatas emanated from that very body of the victim to be purified, or the cloud of Amoghasiddhi.

original: de nas de rnams kyi yang /
analyzed: de nas de rnams kyi yang /
translated: Then,

original: 'od zer lnga yi sbyor ba yis //
analyzed: 'od zer lnga yi sbyor ba yis //
translated: by the union of the five lights,

original: de ni gzi brjid dbab par bya //
analyzed: de ni gzi brjid dbab par bya //
translated: radiance is caused to descend.

original: zhes bya bar sbyar ro //🔽de ni zhes bya ba ni bsgrub par bya ba'i'o //
analyzed: zhes bya bar sbyar ro //🔽de ni zhes bya ba ni bsgrub par bya ba'i'o //
translated: There is the victim.

original: sangs rgyas kun dges shing 'jam dpal 'dra bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kun dges shing 'jam dpal 'dra bar 'gyur ro //
translated: He becomes like Mañjuśrī, and all the Buddhas rejoice.

original: sangs rgyas de rnams kyis kyang de la dbang bskur ba stsol bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: sangs rgyas de rnams kyis kyang de la dbang bskur ba stsol bar 'gyur ro //
translated: And those Buddhas confer empowerment on him.

original: go 'phang las byed par 'gyur zhes bya ba ni ming gi las byed pa ste /
analyzed: go 'phang las byed par 'gyur zhes bya ba ni ming gi las byed pa ste /
translated: “He becomes the agent of the state” means he becomes the agent of the name.

original: dbang du bya ba'i phyir gang gi ming nas smos pa de dbang du byed do zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: dbang du bya ba'i phyir gang gi ming nas smos pa de dbang du byed do zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: For the sake of subjugation, he subjugates whomever he utters the name of.

original: bltas zhes bya ba ni dbang du bya ba'i phyir gang la bltas pa ste de rnams kyang dbang du 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: bltas zhes bya ba ni dbang du bya ba'i phyir gang la bltas pa ste de rnams kyang dbang du 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: “He becomes the agent of the gaze” means that for the sake of subjugation, he subjugates whomever he gazes upon.

original: rin po che'i sprin ni sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'i sprin no //
analyzed: rin po che'i sprin ni sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'i sprin no //
translated: “Jewel clouds” are clouds of Buddhas and Bodhisattvas.

original: lhag ma rnams ni snga ma bzhin no //
analyzed: lhag ma rnams ni snga ma bzhin no //
translated: The rest is as before.

original: bka'i 'khor lo'i sbyor bas sngar gsungs pa nyid kyi mngon spyod de nyid kyang kha bskang ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: bka'i 'khor lo'i sbyor bas sngar gsungs pa nyid kyi mngon spyod de nyid kyang kha bskang ba'i phyir ro //
translated: The application of the wheel of command is the same as the previous one, and it is also a supplement to the very same destructive rite.

original: nam mkha' zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa la /
analyzed: nam mkha' zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa la /
translated: “Space” and so forth.

original: nam mkha' rdo rje ni nam mkha' thams cad do //🔽srin po la @319a * //
analyzed: nam mkha' rdo rje ni nam mkha' thams cad do // srin po la @319a * //
translated: Space-vajra means all space.🔽The rakshasas, etc.

original: sogs pa ni rang gi khro bo'i lha'i ba spu'i bu ga las spros pa rnams kyis te /
analyzed: sogs pa ni rang gi khro bo'i lha'i ba spu'i bu ga las spros pa rnams kyis te /
translated: are those emanated from the pores of one's own wrathful deity.

original: khyab pa zhes bya ba ni lhag ma'o //
analyzed: khyab pa zhes bya ba ni lhag ma'o //
translated: The word pervade is the remainder.

original: dgra bo rnams ni zhes bya ba ni dgra ste ma dad par smra ba la sogs pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: dgra bo rnams ni zhes bya ba ni dgra ste ma dad par smra ba la sogs pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The enemies are those who are hostile, who speak unfavorably, etc.

original: gnod byed pa zhes bya ba ni bsgrub par bya ba des nam mkha' ngos khyab pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la gnod par byed pa ste /
analyzed: gnod byed pa zhes bya ba ni bsgrub par bya ba des nam mkha' ngos khyab pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la gnod par byed pa ste /
translated: The harm-doers are those who harm the Buddhas who pervade the sky with their presence, the ones to be accomplished.

original: dbu sta re la sogs pas gcod par bsgom par bya zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: dbu sta re la sogs pas gcod par bsgom par bya zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that one should imagine them being cut up with axes, etc.

original: rnal 'byor zhes bya ba ni mngon spyod kyi bsam gtan 'di nyid do //
analyzed: rnal 'byor zhes bya ba ni mngon spyod kyi bsam gtan 'di nyid do //
translated: The yoga is this very concentration of the rite of assault.

original: mtshon cha sna tshogs thogs pa ni khro bo'i spros pa'o //
analyzed: mtshon cha sna tshogs thogs pa ni khro bo'i spros pa'o //
translated: The various weapons are the emanations of the wrathful ones.

original: de rnams kyis mnan pa'i dum bur byas pa'o //
analyzed: de rnams kyis mnan pa'i dum bur byas pa'o //
translated: They crush them and cut them into pieces.

original: thams cad ni srin po la sogs pas so ;
analyzed: thams cad ni srin po la sogs pas so ;
translated: All of them are the rakshasas, etc.🔽

original: / drangs par bya zhes bya ba ni kun nas drangs par ro //
analyzed: / drangs par bya zhes bya ba ni kun nas drangs par ro //
translated: The phrase should be summoned means should be brought together.

original: bsgoms na zhes bya ba ni sgrub pa pos bsgoms na'o //
analyzed: bsgoms na zhes bya ba ni sgrub pa pos bsgoms na'o //
translated: The phrase if one meditates means if the practitioner meditates.

original: rdo rje dam tshig gi sprin ni khro bo la sogs pa'i sprin spros pa'o //
analyzed: rdo rje dam tshig gi sprin ni khro bo la sogs pa'i sprin spros pa'o //
translated: The phrase the cloud of the vajra commitments means the cloud of wrathful ones and so forth.

original: de rnams kyis bkod pa ni dum bur gtubs pa'o //
analyzed: de rnams kyis bkod pa ni dum bur gtubs pa'o //
translated: The phrase they should be cut into pieces means they should be cut into small pieces.

original: le'u 'dir mngon spyod ma gsungs pa gang yin pa de le'u bco brgyad pa las blta bar bya zhing kha sbyar dbye ba la sogs pa ni bla ma'i man ngag nyid las shes par bya'o //
analyzed: le'u 'dir mngon spyod ma gsungs pa gang yin pa de le'u bco brgyad pa las blta bar bya zhing kha sbyar dbye ba la sogs pa ni bla ma'i man ngag nyid las shes par bya'o //
translated: The phrase what is not taught in this chapter on violent action should be learned from the eighteenth chapter means that the violent action that is not taught in this chapter should be learned from the eighteenth chapter. The opening of the mouth and so forth should be learned from the oral instructions of the guru.

original: yid kyi las rnams gsungs nas da ni ting nge 'dzin rnams bshad par bya ba yin la /
analyzed: yid kyi las rnams gsungs nas da ni ting nge 'dzin rnams bshad par bya ba yin la /
translated: Having taught the mental actions, now the meditative concentrations should be explained.

original: de yang chog ji lta ba bzhin du sngags las byung ba'i lha'i sku 'khor dang bcas pa'i mtshan nyid can yin no //
analyzed: de yang chog ji lta ba bzhin du sngags las byung ba'i lha'i sku 'khor dang bcas pa'i mtshan nyid can yin no //
translated: And that is the nature of the deity's body arisen from mantra together with the retinue, just as it is appropriate.

original: de la de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i sku mdog dang / zhal dang cod pan dang / rtsa ba'i phyag mtshan rnams ni le'u dang po dang gsum pa dag las gsungs pa yin la /🔽de rnams kyi bdag nyid tshigs su bcad pa phyed dang bzhis nye bar mtshon par gyur pas dran par byed pa dang lhag ma rnams kyis de dag nyid tshigs su bcad pa lnga po la sogs pas ston par byed pa dang tshigs su bcad pa bzhi pa'i phyed
analyzed: de la de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i sku mdog dang / zhal dang cod pan dang / rtsa ba'i phyag mtshan rnams ni le'u dang po dang gsum pa dag las gsungs pa yin la / de rnams kyi bdag nyid tshigs su bcad pa phyed dang bzhis nye bar mtshon par gyur pas dran par byed pa dang lhag ma rnams kyis de dag nyid tshigs su bcad pa lnga po la sogs pas ston par byed pa dang tshigs su bcad pa bzhi pa'i phyed
translated: The colors of the bodies of the five Tathagatas, their faces, crowns, and root signs are taught in the first and third chapters.🔽The first half of the fourth verse illustrates their natures. The remaining verses teach those natures with the fifth verse, etc. The first half of the fourth verse teaches the certainty of the hand implements of all of them and the other signs.

original: kyis thams cad kyi phyag gi nges pa dang mtshan ma gzhan rnams ston par byed pa la rnam par snang mdzad ces bya ba la sogs pa ni ting nge 'dzin rnams kyis bstan pa'o //
analyzed: kyis thams cad kyi phyag gi nges pa dang mtshan ma gzhan rnams ston par byed pa la rnam par snang mdzad ces bya ba la sogs pa ni ting nge 'dzin rnams kyis bstan pa'o //
translated: The words Vairochana, etc., teach the samadhis.

original: ston ka'i 'dam bu ni yongs su smin pa'i 'dam bu'o //
analyzed: ston ka'i 'dam bu ni yongs su smin pa'i 'dam bu'o //
translated: Autumnal lotus is a fully ripened lotus.

original: gzhan dag ni ston ka'i sprin lta bu'o zhes zer ro //
analyzed: gzhan dag ni ston ka'i sprin lta bu'o zhes zer ro //
translated: Others say it is like an autumn cloud.

analyzed: rdo rje can zhes bya ba ni mi bskyod pa ste gang gi 'jig rten gyi khams kun du 'khrug par byed pa ste drag po nyid kyi phyir ro //

original: 'dod chags can ni 'od dpag med pa'o //
analyzed: 'dod chags can ni 'od dpag med pa'o //

original: longs spyod ni 'khor lo'o //
analyzed: longs spyod ni 'khor lo'o //

original: de nas cir 'gyur zhe na /
analyzed: de nas cir 'gyur zhe na /

original: bsgoms @319b na des par 'grub par 'gyur te /

analyzed: de zhes bya ba'am de rnams zhes bya ba ni lhag ma'o //
translated: The he or they is the remainder.

original: g-yas pa'i phyag tu zhes bya ba ni g-yas pa'i phyag gnyis pa la'o //
analyzed: g-yas pa'i phyag tu zhes bya ba ni g-yas pa'i phyag gnyis pa la'o //

original: rdo rje zhes bya ba ni lha thams cad kyi'o //
analyzed: rdo rje zhes bya ba ni lha thams cad kyi'o //
translated: The vajra is of all the deities.

original: mtshon cha ni bzang po sna tshogs bsnams zhes bya ba ni phyag mtshan sna tshogs tsam nyid gsungs pa yin gyi rang gi ngo bo nyid ni ma yin te /
analyzed: mtshon cha ni bzang po sna tshogs bsnams zhes bya ba ni phyag mtshan sna tshogs tsam nyid gsungs pa yin gyi rang gi ngo bo nyid ni ma yin te /
translated: The weapon is the various good ones, that is, he holds various weapons, it is said, but not their own nature,

original: sngar gsungs pa nyid kyi phyir ro zhes bya bar dgongs so //
analyzed: sngar gsungs pa nyid kyi phyir ro zhes bya bar dgongs so //
translated: because it was previously stated.

original: de bas na de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag mtshan rnams gtso bo nyid yin pa'i phyir dang sngar gsungs pa nyid kyi phyir de dag nyid lhag thams cad kyi phyag drug po dag la spyi'i tshul du mdzad pa'o //
analyzed: de bas na de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag mtshan rnams gtso bo nyid yin pa'i phyir dang sngar gsungs pa nyid kyi phyir de dag nyid lhag thams cad kyi phyag drug po dag la spyi'i tshul du mdzad pa'o //
translated: Therefore, since the emblems of the Tathagatas are the principal ones, and since they were mentioned previously, they are assigned in general to all the six hands of all the deities.

original: bcom ldan 'das mi bskyod pa ni thabs dang shes rab kyi tshogs kyis bsdus pa nyid kyi phyir gnyi ga mtshan ma yin te /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das mi bskyod pa ni thabs dang shes rab kyi tshogs kyis bsdus pa nyid kyi phyir gnyi ga mtshan ma yin te /
translated: The Lord Akshobhya is the emblem of both, because he is the embodiment of the accumulations of means and insight.

original: le'u gsum pa las /
analyzed: le'u gsum pa las /
translated: In the third chapter of the Condensation of the Mandala Rite it says,

original: tshogs gnyis dang ni ldan pa yis //
analyzed: tshogs gnyis dang ni ldan pa yis //
translated: Endowed with the two accumulations,

original: mi bskyod pa yi rgyal mchog dang // zhes gsungs pa yin no //
analyzed: mi bskyod pa yi rgyal mchog dang // zhes gsungs pa yin no //
translated: the supreme victor Akshobhya...

original: de bas na phyag gnyis kyis gzung bar bya ba mi bskyod pa'i mtshan ma thabs dang shes rab ni ci rigs par lha thams cad kyi rtsa ba'i phyag dag la yin zhing /
analyzed: de bas na phyag gnyis kyis gzung bar bya ba mi bskyod pa'i mtshan ma thabs dang shes rab ni ci rigs par lha thams cad kyi rtsa ba'i phyag dag la yin zhing /
translated: Therefore, the emblems of Akshobhya held in the two hands are means and insight, and are assigned to the root hands of all the deities as appropriate.

original: rang gi mtshan ma ni g-yas pa'i gnyis pa la 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rang gi mtshan ma ni g-yas pa'i gnyis pa la 'gyur ro //
translated: His own emblem is in the second right hand.

original: 'khor lo dang nor bu dang padma dang ral gri rnams lhag ma lus par 'gyur ba de rnams dang po'i bzhin gshegs pa'i gnas dang 'brel par grub pa yin no //
analyzed: 'khor lo dang nor bu dang padma dang ral gri rnams lhag ma lus par 'gyur ba de rnams dang po'i bzhin gshegs pa'i gnas dang 'brel par grub pa yin no //
translated: The remaining wheel, jewel, lotus, and sword are established as connected with the abode of the first Tathāgata.

original: dang po de yang rnam par snang mdzad de /
analyzed: dang po de yang rnam par snang mdzad de /
translated: That first one is Vairocana.

original: de'i g-yas pa'i gnyis pa la 'khor lo'o //
analyzed: de'i g-yas pa'i gnyis pa la 'khor lo'o //
translated: On his right, the second is the wheel.

original: g-yas pa'i gsum pa la ral gri ste /
analyzed: g-yas pa'i gsum pa la ral gri ste /
translated: On his right, the third is the sword,

original: ral gri ni g-yas pa la nges pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: ral gri ni g-yas pa la nges pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because the sword is fixed on the right.

original: cig shos dag la ni ci rigs par nor bu dang padma'o //
analyzed: cig shos dag la ni ci rigs par nor bu dang padma'o //
translated: On the other two, the jewel and lotus are as appropriate.

original: de nas mi bskyod pa ste /
analyzed: de nas mi bskyod pa ste /
translated: Then, Akṣobhya.

original: de nas mi bskyod pa'i gnyis pa la rdo rje ste /
analyzed: de nas mi bskyod pa'i gnyis pa la rdo rje ste /
translated: Then, on the second of Akṣobhya, the vajra,

original: thun mong ma yin pa'i mtshan nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: thun mong ma yin pa'i mtshan nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is the uncommon characteristic.

original: shes rab dang thabs ni thun mong du gyur pa yin te /
analyzed: shes rab dang thabs ni thun mong du gyur pa yin te /
translated: Wisdom and means are common,

original: de dag ni shes rab kyi ye shes sgrub pa nyid kyis thams cad kyi nges par gzung bar bya ba yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de dag ni shes rab kyi ye shes sgrub pa nyid kyis thams cad kyi nges par gzung bar bya ba yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because they are to be ascertained by all through the attainment of the wisdom of wisdom.

original: lhag ma ni snga ma bzhin no //
analyzed: lhag ma ni snga ma bzhin no //
translated: The rest is the same as before.

original: de nas rin chen 'byung ldan te de'i 'khor lo'i gnas su ni nor bu yin no //
analyzed: de nas rin chen 'byung ldan te de'i 'khor lo'i gnas su ni nor bu yin no //
translated: Then Ratnasaṃbhava, in the place of his wheel is a jewel.

original: de bas na nor bu'i gnas su ni 'khor lo'o //
analyzed: de bas na nor bu'i gnas su ni 'khor lo'o //
translated: Therefore, in the place of the jewel is a wheel.

original: lhag ma ni snga ma bzhin no //🔽de nas 'dod dpag tu med pa ste /
analyzed: lhag ma ni snga ma bzhin no // de nas 'dod dpag tu med pa ste /
translated: The rest is the same as before.

original: de'i 'khor lo'i gnas su ni padma'o //
analyzed: de'i 'khor lo'i gnas su ni padma'o //
translated: Then Amoghasiddhi, in the place of his wheel is a lotus.

original: padma'i gnas su ni 'khor lo'o //🔽de nas don yod par grub pa ste /
analyzed: padma'i gnas su ni 'khor lo'o // de nas don yod par grub pa ste /
translated: In the place of the lotus is a wheel.

original: de'i 'khor lo'i gnas su ni ral gri'o //
analyzed: de'i 'khor lo'i gnas su ni ral gri'o //
translated: Then Amoghasiddhi, in the place of his wheel is a sword.

original: ral gri'i gnas su 'khor lo'o //
analyzed: ral gri'i gnas su 'khor lo'o //
translated: In the place of the sword is a wheel.

original: de bzhin du lha gzhan dag la yang shes par bya'o //🔽bzang po ni sngags pa'i gzugs te thun @320a * //
analyzed: de bzhin du lha gzhan dag la yang shes par bya'o // bzang po ni sngags pa'i gzugs te thun @320a * //
translated: In the same way, one should understand the other deities.

original: mong ma yin pa'i mtshan dang dpe byad ma tshang ba med pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: mong ma yin pa'i mtshan dang dpe byad ma tshang ba med pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: The good is the form of the mantrin, because it is the complete set of the uncommon major and minor marks.

original: sangs rgyas rnams kyi sku ni sems tsam nyid du yang dag par mthong ba de'i phyir rig pa de nyid ni spyan no //
analyzed: sangs rgyas rnams kyi sku ni sems tsam nyid du yang dag par mthong ba de'i phyir rig pa de nyid ni spyan no //
translated: The eye is that knowledge, because one sees the bodies of the buddhas as just mind.

original: sangs rgyas rnams kyi thugs rdo rje ni nam mkha' rdo rje'o //
analyzed: sangs rgyas rnams kyi thugs rdo rje ni nam mkha' rdo rje'o //
translated: The vajra mind of the buddhas is the vajra space.

original: de'i spyan ni lta ba ste //
analyzed: de'i spyan ni lta ba ste //
translated: Her eye is the seeing,

original: m'a ma k'i zhes bya ba'i don to//
analyzed: m'a ma k'i zhes bya ba'i don to//
translated: which is the meaning of Mamaki.

original: rgyal mo che ni rig pa'i rgyal mo chen mo'o //
analyzed: rgyal mo che ni rig pa'i rgyal mo chen mo'o //
translated: The great queen is the great knowledge queen.

original: sangs rgyas rnams kyi gsung rdo rje'i spyan ni lta ba ste /
analyzed: sangs rgyas rnams kyi gsung rdo rje'i spyan ni lta ba ste /
translated: The eye of the speech vajra of the buddhas is the seeing,

original: gos dkar mo zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: gos dkar mo zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: which is the meaning of Pandaravasini.

original: sangs rgyas rnams kyi rdo rje gsum po ro gcig pa ni ye shes so //
analyzed: sangs rgyas rnams kyi rdo rje gsum po ro gcig pa ni ye shes so //
translated: The knowledge of the buddhas is the single taste of the three vajras.

original: de'i rang gi autpala ni rdo rje autpala'o //
analyzed: de'i rang gi autpala ni rdo rje autpala'o //
translated: Her own utpala is the vajra utpala.

original: de 'dzin pa ni rig ma'i sgrol ma zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: de 'dzin pa ni rig ma'i sgrol ma zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning of Tara, the knowledge consort, is the one who holds that.

original: rab tu gsal ba'i mdangs te 'di'o //
analyzed: rab tu gsal ba'i mdangs te 'di'o //
translated: It is the very clear radiance, this one.

original: 'od gsal ba dang mdangs mdzes pas so //
analyzed: 'od gsal ba dang mdangs mdzes pas so //
translated: It is the clear light and the beautiful radiance.

original: drag po'i 'od bzang ni 'bar ba'i 'od zer gyi phreng ba can no //
analyzed: drag po'i 'od bzang ni 'bar ba'i 'od zer gyi phreng ba can no //
translated: The fierce good radiance is the one with the garland of blazing light rays.

original: 'jigs pa'i rgyu nyid kyi phyir 'jigs pa'o //
analyzed: 'jigs pa'i rgyu nyid kyi phyir 'jigs pa'o //
translated: It is the fear because it is the cause of fear.

original: rnon po ni rab tu gtum po'o //
analyzed: rnon po ni rab tu gtum po'o //
translated: The sharp is the very fierce.

original: rab tu 'phro ba ni gzi brjid dang ldan pa'o //
analyzed: rab tu 'phro ba ni gzi brjid dang ldan pa'o //
translated: The very radiant is the one with splendor.

original: gang gis gdug pa zhabs kyis gnon par mdzad pa de la de skad ces bya'o //
analyzed: gang gis gdug pa zhabs kyis gnon par mdzad pa de la de skad ces bya'o //
translated: The one who presses down on the wicked with her foot is called that.

original: sbyor ba can gyis rtag tu zhes bya ba ni rgyun mi 'chad par rab tu sbyor bas so //
analyzed: sbyor ba can gyis rtag tu zhes bya ba ni rgyun mi 'chad par rab tu sbyor bas so //
translated: “Always engaged” means always engaged in the uninterrupted practice.

original: rdo rje mi 'chi ni bdud rtsi thab sbyor ro //
analyzed: rdo rje mi 'chi ni bdud rtsi thab sbyor ro //
translated: Vajra-Amṛta is Amṛtakuṇḍali.

original: gang la 'od zer 'phro bar rab tu 'khrug pa'i mtshan ma thugs mnga' ba ste /
analyzed: gang la 'od zer 'phro bar rab tu 'khrug pa'i mtshan ma thugs mnga' ba ste /
translated: He has the sign of a radiant, blazing light.

original: drag po'i thugs de nyid las de rnams 'byung ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: drag po'i thugs de nyid las de rnams 'byung ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Because they arise from that very wrathful mind.

original: takki ni takk'i sgras 'dod pa'i don min pa de bas na 'dod pa rnams 'gugs pa'i phyir 'dod pa'i rgyal po'o //
analyzed: takki ni takk'i sgras 'dod pa'i don min pa de bas na 'dod pa rnams 'gugs pa'i phyir 'dod pa'i rgyal po'o //
translated: Takkirāja is the king of desires, because he attracts desires with the sound “takka” which is not a desired object.

original: de'i de kho na nyid ni 'dod pa'i ye shes te /
analyzed: de'i de kho na nyid ni 'dod pa'i ye shes te /
translated: His reality is the knowledge of desire.

original: 'dod pa rnams la ye shes can nyid 'brel pa ste /
analyzed: 'dod pa rnams la ye shes can nyid 'brel pa ste /
translated: The connection is that he is the knower of desires.

original: yid kyis 'dzin pa'i zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: yid kyis 'dzin pa'i zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that he holds them in his mind.

original: de nyid kyi phyir phyag bzhi pa ste /
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir phyag bzhi pa ste /
translated: For that very reason, he has four arms.

original: longs spyod bzhi dang yang dag par ldan pa zhes bya ba'i don to ;
analyzed: longs spyod bzhi dang yang dag par ldan pa zhes bya ba'i don to ;
translated: The meaning is that he is endowed with the four enjoyments.

original: /'jigs par byed pa'i mchog ni rgyu'o //
analyzed: /'jigs par byed pa'i mchog ni rgyu'o //
translated: The supreme terror is the cause.

original: stobs po che ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bdag nyid gso bar byed pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: stobs po che ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bdag nyid gso bar byed pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The Great Powerful One is so called because he heals the nature of all the Buddhas.

original: rdo rje ni khro bo chen po nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rdo rje ni khro bo chen po nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The Vajra is so called because he is the Great Wrathful One.

original: mun pa ni mi shes pa'o //
analyzed: mun pa ni mi shes pa'o //
translated: Darkness is ignorance.

original: gdug pa thams cad 'joms pa ni 'dus pa'o //
analyzed: gdug pa thams cad 'joms pa ni 'dus pa'o //
translated: The Destroyer of all Evils is the Assembly.

original: sems 'dren par byed 'dul par byed pa'i dbyug pa sngon po'i mtshan ma 'di la yod pas na dbyug sngon can yin no //
analyzed: sems 'dren par byed 'dul par byed pa'i dbyug pa sngon po'i mtshan ma 'di la yod pas na dbyug sngon can yin no //
translated: The Blue-throated One is so called because he has the sign of the blue staff which leads and tames the mind.

original: rdo rje rnams bsdus pa yin pas na rdo rje gsum yang yin la /
analyzed: rdo rje rnams bsdus pa yin pas na rdo rje gsum yang yin la /
translated: The Three Vajras are so called because they are the collection of all Vajras.

original: 'byung ba yang dag par bsdus pa yin pas na 'byung ba yang yin te /
analyzed: 'byung ba yang dag par bsdus pa yin pas na 'byung ba yang yin te /
translated: The Element is so called because it is the perfect collection of the elements.

original: bsam gtan lngas so //
analyzed: bsam gtan lngas so //
translated: By the five contemplations.

original: khro bo'i yin pas na rdo rje'o //
analyzed: khro bo'i yin pas na rdo rje'o //
translated: The Vajra is so called because he is the Wrathful One.

original: thugs rin po che mi g-yo bar 'dzin pa'i rnal 'byor gyis @320b brtan par byed pa'i phyir mi g-yo ba'o //
analyzed: thugs rin po che mi g-yo bar 'dzin pa'i rnal 'byor gyis @320b brtan par byed pa'i phyir mi g-yo ba'o //
translated: The Immovable is so called because he stabilizes the mind by the yoga of holding the immovable jewel of the mind.

original: rdo rje las byung zhes bya ba ni rdo rje sems dpa' babs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rdo rje las byung zhes bya ba ni rdo rje sems dpa' babs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The Descent of the Vajra is so called because Vajrasattva descends.

original: zur gyis blta zhes bya ba ni shin tu chags pas yon por lta ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: zur gyis blta zhes bya ba ni shin tu chags pas yon por lta ba'i phyir ro //
translated: “Looking askance” means looking crookedly due to great passion.

original: zhi bzhes bya ba ni shin tu sbyangs pa'i bde bas shin du gzhon sha chags pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: zhi bzhes bya ba ni shin tu sbyangs pa'i bde bas shin du gzhon sha chags pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: “Peaceful” means having the nature of great youthfulness due to the bliss of great pliancy.

original: de nyid kyi phyir byis pa'i gzugs can yin no ;
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir byis pa'i gzugs can yin no ;
translated: For that very reason, he has the form of a youth.

original: / ral gri zhags pa rnams zhes bya ba ni rnam par rtog pa'i g-yeng ba gcod pa'i phyir dang bcings nas 'dren pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: / ral gri zhags pa rnams zhes bya ba ni rnam par rtog pa'i g-yeng ba gcod pa'i phyir dang bcings nas 'dren pa'i phyir ro //
translated: “Sword and noose” means that he severs the distraction of conceptualization and binds and then leads.

original: de nyid kyi phyir 'di'i rdo rje'i gnas su ral gri bsnams la ral gri'i gnas su ni 'khor lo'o //
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir 'di'i rdo rje'i gnas su ral gri bsnams la ral gri'i gnas su ni 'khor lo'o //
translated: For that very reason, he holds a sword in the place of a vajra and a wheel in the place of a sword.

original: rin po che'i gnas su zhags pa ljang gu bsnams pa yin no //
analyzed: rin po che'i gnas su zhags pa ljang gu bsnams pa yin no //
translated: In the place of a jewel, he holds a green lasso.

original: yi ge gcig ces bya ba ni yi ge bhr'um gyi ngo bo nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: yi ge gcig ces bya ba ni yi ge bhr'um gyi ngo bo nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: “One-syllable” means that he is the essence of the syllable bhrūṃ.

original: 'khor lo can zhes bya ba ni phyag na 'khor lo bsnams pa'o //
analyzed: 'khor lo can zhes bya ba ni phyag na 'khor lo bsnams pa'o //
translated: “Having a wheel” means that he holds a wheel in his hand.

original: bsam gtan dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba ni 'bras bur gyur pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi rang bzhin nyid yin pa'i phyir /🔽bsam gtan de yang yin la /
analyzed: bsam gtan dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba ni 'bras bur gyur pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi rang bzhin nyid yin pa'i phyir / bsam gtan de yang yin la /
translated: The “circle of concentration” is so called because it is the nature of the meditative stabilization that is the result.🔽It is concentration because it is the nature of meditative stabilization.

original: phra mo'i dkyil 'khor gyi rang bzhin nyid yin pa'i phyir dkyil 'khor yang yin la de ltar na bsam gtan dkyil 'khor ro //
analyzed: phra mo'i dkyil 'khor gyi rang bzhin nyid yin pa'i phyir dkyil 'khor yang yin la de ltar na bsam gtan dkyil 'khor ro //
translated: It is a circle because it is the nature of a subtle circle.

original: gzhung la las ni bsam gtan dang dkyil 'khor dag ces 'byung ste /
analyzed: gzhung la las ni bsam gtan dang dkyil 'khor dag ces 'byung ste /
translated: Some texts say “concentration and circle,”

original: de la mtshan nyid tha dad pa'i phyir tshig gnyis par byas nas gzhi mthun par bya'o //
analyzed: de la mtshan nyid tha dad pa'i phyir tshig gnyis par byas nas gzhi mthun par bya'o //
translated: but since they have different characteristics, they are two words that have a common locus.

original: sgrib pa thams cad 'joms pa'i ye shes 'dzin pa'i phyir /
analyzed: sgrib pa thams cad 'joms pa'i ye shes 'dzin pa'i phyir /
translated: Because it holds the pristine wisdom that destroys all obscurations,

original: gnod pa'i ye shes mchog 'dzin pa ste /
analyzed: gnod pa'i ye shes mchog 'dzin pa ste /
translated: it is the holder of the pristine wisdom of destruction.

original: gnod mdzes rgyal po'o //
analyzed: gnod mdzes rgyal po'o //
translated: It is Sumbharāja.

original: 'jig pa'i rgya mtsho skyed par byed pa'i phyir de dang 'dra ba'i 'od do //
analyzed: 'jig pa'i rgya mtsho skyed par byed pa'i phyir de dang 'dra ba'i 'od do //
translated: Because it generates the ocean of destruction, it has a light like that.

original: bsam gtan 'od bzang zhes bya ba ni bsam gtan 'bras bur gyur pa'i ting nge 'dzin de'i don du 'od bzang ba ste /
analyzed: bsam gtan 'od bzang zhes bya ba ni bsam gtan 'bras bur gyur pa'i ting nge 'dzin de'i don du 'od bzang ba ste /
translated: The one called “Good Light of Meditation” is the good light for the sake of that samādhi which is the result of meditation.

original: mtshan ma'i rnam pa can gyi 'od zer thams cad du spro ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: mtshan ma'i rnam pa can gyi 'od zer thams cad du spro ba'i phyir ro //
translated: It is good light because it radiates all the light rays which have the aspect of signs.

original: rgyud gzhan dag las lha gsungs pa gang yin pa de dag kyang 'dir bsgoms nas 'grub par 'gyur ba de ltar na /
analyzed: rgyud gzhan dag las lha gsungs pa gang yin pa de dag kyang 'dir bsgoms nas 'grub par 'gyur ba de ltar na /
translated: Those deities who are taught in other tantras are also accomplished here by meditating on them.

original: de'i ting nge 'dzin bstan pa'i phyir gzi brjid phung po zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: de'i ting nge 'dzin bstan pa'i phyir gzi brjid phung po zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: In order to teach his samādhi, [the Bhagavān] declares, “Mass of Splendor,” and so on.

analyzed: ting nge 'dzin rnams ni brtan pa'o //

analyzed: gsal ba'i dkyil 'khor ni zla ba'i dkyil 'khor ro //

analyzed: sangs rgyas gsungs ni rab bsgoms la //

original: rnam par snang mdzad rnam par bsam //
analyzed: rnam par snang mdzad rnam par bsam //
translated: One should visualize Vairocana,

original: zhes bya ba ni /

analyzed: de bsdus pa las byung ba'i sa bon yongs su gyur par bsam par bya'o //
translated: and one should imagine that it becomes the seed syllable that arises from that.

original: ji lta bu zhe na /
analyzed: ji lta bu zhe na /
translated: What is it like?

original: gsal ba ste dri ma med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gsal ba ste dri ma med pa'i phyir ro //

original: zhi ba ni zhi ba'i nyams dang ldan pa ste /
analyzed: zhi ba ni zhi ba'i nyams dang ldan pa ste /
translated: It is peaceful, because it has the experience of peace,

original: gnas ngan len gyi gnas gyur pa'i rang bzhin nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gnas ngan len gyi gnas gyur pa'i rang bzhin nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //

original: zla ba bzhin ni shin tu dkar ba nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: zla ba bzhin ni shin tu dkar ba nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: It is like the moon, because it is very bright.

analyzed: 'di las spros pa'i 'od zer kha dog lnga po rnams kyis thams cad du snang ba mdzad pa'i phyir 'od zer sna tshogs 'dra ba'i don to //

original: me long lta bur yang dag byung //
analyzed: me long lta bur yang dag byung //

analyzed: zhes bya ba ni me long lta bu'i ye shes kyi ngo bo nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //

original: khams gsum dag ni brgyan pa ru //
analyzed: khams gsum dag ni brgyan pa ru //

analyzed: zhes bya ba ni dper na gling ma lus pa'i ston ka'i zla ba rgyas @321b pa lta bu'o //
translated: It is like the autumn moon illuminating all the continents.

original: gang la rgyan rnams kun te /
analyzed: gang la rgyan rnams kun te /
translated: It is like an ornament for all the world.

analyzed: do shal dang dpung rgyan la sogs pa ngag gis brgyan cing bkod pa yin pa'o //
translated: It is like a necklace, armlet, etc. for all the world.

analyzed: byang chub mthong zhes bya ba ni rnam par snang mdzad mngon sum du byed pa'o //

analyzed: bsam gtan rdo rje sprin nyid ni rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin te /
translated: The “cloud of vajra meditative stabilization” is the vajra meditative stabilization.

analyzed: de rab bsgom ni rab kyi mthar thug par bsgom pa'o //
translated: “Cultivating that” is cultivating it to the highest degree.

analyzed: rnam par snang mdzad kyi dam tshig ni phyag rgya chen po'o //
translated: The “pledge of Vairochana” is the great seal.

original: de 'byung ba ni bskyed pa'o //
analyzed: de 'byung ba ni bskyed pa'o //
translated: “Arising from that” is generating it.

analyzed: de nyid kyi rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa nyid kyi phyir mdzes pa'o //

original: mi zad pa nyid kyi phyir rdo rje'o //
analyzed: mi zad pa nyid kyi phyir rdo rje'o //

translated: It is so called because it is the object of that.

analyzed: rdo rje dkyil 'khor ni nyi ma'o //

analyzed: rdo rje de nyid mi bskyod pa nyid thob par 'gyur ro //

original: ji lta bu zhe na /
analyzed: ji lta bu zhe na /
translated: How?

analyzed: zhi ba'i ye shes gnas ni mtshan ma'i dri ma rnams zhi bas na zhi ba'o //

analyzed: bsam gtan 'di yis rab tu bskul ba ni nye bar bstan pa'o //

analyzed: dam tshig thams cad kyi rdo rje ni mi bskyod pa ste rdo rje gsum gyi dam tshig nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //

original: chos kyi dkyil 'khor ni nyi ma'o //
analyzed: chos kyi dkyil 'khor ni nyi ma'o //
translated: The Dharma maṇḍala is the sun.

original: chos kyi sems dpa' ni 'od dpag tu med pa'o //
analyzed: chos kyi sems dpa' ni 'od dpag tu med pa'o //
translated: The Dharma sattva is Amitābha.

analyzed: ye shes rgya mtsho ni bde bar gshegs pa'i so sor rtog pa'i ye shes so //

analyzed: spyan nyid ni mchog ste rig pa'i rgyal mo'o //
translated: The eye itself is supreme, the vidyā queen.

analyzed: bud med sgyu ma ni dam du 'khyud pas dga' ba ston cing rnam par rol pa'o //

analyzed: de rnams kyi mchog ni tshogs so //

original: ji lta bu zhe na /
analyzed: ji lta bu zhe na /

analyzed: zhes bya ba ni ji ltar 'dod pa'i sangs rgyas kyi 'khor lo sprul pa'i phyir 'khor lo'o //

original: yid bzhin gyi nor bu ni me long lta bu'i ye shes te /
analyzed: yid bzhin gyi nor bu ni me long lta bu'i ye shes te /
translated: The wish-granting gem is the mirror-like gnosis.

analyzed: sgrub pa po la de rab kyi mthar phyin pa la mchog ster bar byed ces bya ba'i don to //

analyzed: spyan gyi dam tshig ni phyag rgya chen po'o //
translated: The commitment of the eye is the great seal.

analyzed: de'i phyag mtshan ni phyag gi gtso bor 'khor lo de la dmigs pa nyid kyi phyir de dang ldan pa'o //

original: rdo rje ni m'a ma k'i'o //
analyzed: rdo rje ni m'a ma k'i'o //
translated: The vajra is Mamaki.

original: chos ni gos dkar mo'o //
analyzed: chos ni gos dkar mo'o //
translated: The Dharma is Pandaravasini.

original: dngos grub ni sgrol ma'o //
analyzed: dngos grub ni sgrol ma'o //
translated: The power is Tara.

analyzed: de rnams kyi dkyil 'khor ni gdan te zla ba'i dkyil 'khor @322a * //

analyzed: de dag nyid de byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs su bgrangs pa'i phyir ro //

analyzed: nam mkha'i rdo rje mchog ni nam mkha'i rdo rje'i tshul te /

original: m'a ma k'i zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: m'a ma k'i zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: It means Mamaki.

original: nang gi reg bya 'dod pa ston pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: nang gi reg bya 'dod pa ston pa nyid kyi phyir ro //

analyzed: de dang ldan pas na nam mkha'i sgyu ma'i mchog dang ldan pa'o //

analyzed: sangs rgyas byang chub ces bya ba ni mi bskyod pa'i ye shes so //

analyzed: mchog ces bya ba ni ye shes khyad par can nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //

analyzed: dngos grub rdo rje can gyi zhes bya ba ni sgrub pa po rnams kyi'o //

analyzed: autpala sngo zhes pa ni dbyings so //

original: dmar zhes bya ba ni kha dog go //
analyzed: dmar zhes bya ba ni kha dog go //

analyzed: chos kyi dbyings shin tu rnam par dag pa'i ye shes ni nam mkha' dong 'dra ba nyid kyis na nam mkha'o //
translated: The intuition of the utterly pure realm of phenomena is “space” because it is like the sky.

analyzed: de'i yum ni bskyed mar gyur pa'i shes rab kyi ste /
translated: Its “mother” is the wisdom that gives birth to it.

analyzed: m'a ma k'i zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: This is the meaning of “Māmakī.”

analyzed: de'i 'od kyi sprin des sangs rgyas thams cad kyi thugs rdo rje tshem par byed pa'o //

analyzed: de la dmigs pa nyid kyi phyir de dang ldan pa'o //
translated: She is “endowed” with that because she is the very object of that.

translated: Vajradharma is Pāṇḍaravāsinī.

analyzed: chos kyi dbyings so sor rig pa yang dag par mtshon par byed pa'i rang bzhin can gyi 'dod chags nyid mtshan pa'o //

analyzed: de yang dag par ston par byed pa'i rnam par rol pa ni sgyu mas mtshan pa'o //

original: de'i tshogs ni sgyu mas mtshan pa'i mchog ste /
analyzed: de'i tshogs ni sgyu mas mtshan pa'i mchog ste /
